elements.title: Yellow 2291
elements.contents: ... that American black bear Yellow 2291 (pictured) and her cubs are the first family of bears in decades to live in the Santa Monica Mountains?

elements.title: Autumn Colors on the Que and Hua Mountains
elements.contents: ... that the 13th-century Autumn Colors on the Que and Hua Mountains inspired many imitations over the following seven centuries?

elements.title: siege of Jerusalem
elements.contents: ... that during the siege of Jerusalem in the First Jewish Revolt, the Romans crucified prisoners in various positions to intimidate the defenders into surrender?

elements.title: Abdelkader Lahmar
elements.contents: ... that Abdelkader Lahmar was a high school economics teacher before being a candidate for the French Parliament?

elements.title: documentary editing
elements.contents: ... that according to the author of a key textbook on documentary editing, a bookstore erroneously assumed that it was related to documentary films instead of archival science?

elements.title: a Thai film
elements.contents: ... that a Thai film went viral in 2025 after viewers shared videos of themselves crying after watching it?

elements.title: Bob Print
elements.contents: ... that Bob Print had a reputation for "being an animal"?

elements.title: Arlecchino
elements.contents: ... that the character Arlecchino in the game Genshin Impact was named after a stock character in Italian commedia dell'arte?

elements.title: Ida Macalpine
elements.contents: ... that, to prove that the "mad king" George III was not actually mad, psychiatrist Ida Macalpine sought out his descendants' faeces?
